game_description: MRRox for MRXPO. Professional virtual event platform for exhibitions, trade shows and conferences. Cross platform support: PC, Mac, Android, iOS, Quest, HoloLens, WindowsMR Visit to learn more: https://www.mrxpo.com/wp/ Sign up for free: https://www.mrxpo.com/join/
review_1: Attend a business lanch party in VR.
